definition: to lure into/to entrap/to trick into/to entice/to induce/to invite/to tempt
to steal (including identity theft, credit card fraud or theft of computer account)/to misappropriate
to be cheated/to be taken in/to be hoodwinked
to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
